entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Goderich
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:29 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Goderich 12:00 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
Temperature: -0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -6.3°C
Wind: WNW 17 km/h gust 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow or ice pellets beginning in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of freezing rain or snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain or snow. Windy. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
